properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 12:13PM EST until February 8 at 4:54AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service Blacksburg Va has issued
a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Virginia...

James River At Buchanan affecting Botetourt County

Several inches of rain fell across the James River Basin on
Thursday into this morning. Excessive runoff continues upstream
forcing the James River as well as its tributaries into flood.
Minor flooding is now in progress along the James River at
Buchanan.

The National Weather Service in Blacksburg Va has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the James River At Buchanan.
* from this afternoon until late tonight.
* At 11 AM EST this morning, the stage was 17.1 feet...and rising.
* Flood Stage is 17.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring. Minor flooding is forecast to continue.
* The river will continue rising to near 17.3 feet this afternoon.
* Impact...at 17.0 feet...Right bank above gage and flats above town
on left bank are inundated. Mostly agricultural lands are affected.
* Flood history...this crest compares to a previous crest of 18.0
feet on Feb 24 2019.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Listen to noaa weather radio or your favorite media outlet for later
statements or warnings.
